channel.title: DevOps on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on SpiderSoft

item.title: How to quickly create a docker image with mysql and import sql file
item.description: I need quick and easy way to restore some of my MySQL databases from sql files. I don’t want to install MySQL on my machine, so I decided to use Docker. I created a simple bash script that will do all the work for me.
